Tidy descriptive statistics

Source: R/ds-multistats.R
ds_tidy_stats.Rd

Descriptive statistics for multiple variables.

ds_tidy_stats(data, ...)

Arguments

data

A tibble or a data.frame.
...

Columns in x.

Value

A tibble.

Deprecated Functions

ds_multi_stats() have been deprecated. Instead use ds_tidy_stats().

Examples

# all columns
ds_tidy_stats(mtcarz)

#> # A tibble: 6 x 16
#>   vars    min    max   mean t_mean median   mode  range variance   stdev  skew
#>   <chr> <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>    <dbl>   <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 disp  71.1  472    231.   228    196.   276.   401.    1.54e+4 124.    0.420
#> 2 drat   2.76   4.93   3.60   3.58   3.70   3.07   2.17  2.86e-1   0.535 0.293
#> 3 hp    52    335    147.   144.   123    110    283     4.70e+3  68.6   0.799
#> 4 mpg   10.4   33.9   20.1   20.0   19.2   10.4   23.5   3.63e+1   6.03  0.672
#> 5 qsec  14.5   22.9   17.8   17.8   17.7   17.0    8.40  3.19e+0   1.79  0.406
#> 6 wt     1.51   5.42   3.22   3.20   3.32   3.44   3.91  9.57e-1   0.978 0.466
#> # ... with 5 more variables: kurtosis <dbl>, coeff_var <dbl>, q1 <dbl>,
#> #   q3 <dbl>, iqrange <dbl>

# multiple columns
ds_tidy_stats(mtcarz, mpg, disp, hp)

#> # A tibble: 3 x 16
#>   vars    min   max  mean t_mean median  mode range variance  stdev  skew
#>   <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>    <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 disp   71.1 472   231.   228    196.  276.  401.   15361.  124.   0.420
#> 2 hp     52   335   147.   144.   123   110   283     4701.   68.6  0.799
#> 3 mpg    10.4  33.9  20.1   20.0   19.2  10.4  23.5     36.3   6.03 0.672
#> # ... with 5 more variables: kurtosis <dbl>, coeff_var <dbl>, q1 <dbl>,
#> #   q3 <dbl>, iqrange <dbl>
